sentences.english: At this point of time, Hanwen arrives to arrest Shouye.
sentences.chinese: 这时汉文与伟民前来拘捕守业，众人吃惊。

sentences.english: Deng Tong is Han Wendi is male bestow favor on, article emperor dotes on to him extremely.
sentences.chinese: 邓通是汉文帝的男宠，文帝对他宠爱得无以复加。

sentences.english: In the Han Emperor, has been ordered fifteenth day as the Lantern Festival.
sentences.chinese: 在汉文帝时，已下令将正月十五定为元宵节。

sentences.english: I'm going to study chinese next year.
The external or internal interference interrupts my interpretation at short intervals.
sentences.chinese: 内部和外部干涉以很短的间隔打扰我汉文英语互译。

sentences.english: Zhang Hanwen, male, was born in 1963.
sentences.chinese: 张汉文，男，1963年出生，大学学历。

sentences.english: Latin and Chinese descriptions and illustrations are given for the new species.
sentences.chinese: 对新种作了拉丁文及汉文描述和图解。

sentences.english: Hanwen was doing his history assignment all yesterday afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 昨天整个下午，汉文都在做他的历史功课。

sentences.english: This paper describes a method of contour Mongolia-Chinese characters, which can be fast attained.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了一种快速提取蒙汉文轮廓字的方法。

sentences.english: Their morphological characteristics were described in Chinese and Latin with microscopical photo plates.
sentences.chinese: 其形态特征有汉文和拉丁文描述以及显微照像图版。

sentences.english: We'll sign few originals, each in Chinese or English language.
sentences.chinese: 咱们将要用汉文和英语分别签署两份原件。

sentences.english: China's Muslims, a journal in the Uygur and Han languages, is widely read.
sentences.chinese: 发行了《中国穆斯林》杂志维吾尔文版和汉文版。

sentences.english: Would you use Chinese in this CHINESE Forum please?
sentences.chinese: 请在此中文论坛里用汉文，好吗？

sentences.english: The Japanese Chinese-character novels belonged to a unique novel type.
sentences.chinese: 日本汉文小说是日本小说中一个独特的类型。

sentences.english: Emperor Wendi of the Han Dynasty advocated thrift.
